summary: Based on the Profumo Scandal of 1963, an affair between an exotic dancer and the Minister of War shakes up the British government.
cast: John Hurt|Joanne Whalley|Bridget Fonda|Ian McKellen|Leslie Phillips|Britt Ekland|Daniel Massey|Roland Gift|Jean Alexander|Alex Norton|Ronald Fraser|Paul Brooke|Jeroen Krabbé|Keith Allen|Ralph Brown|Ken Campbell|Iain Cuthbertson|Susannah Doyle|Joanna Dunham|Trevor Eve|Oliver Ford Davies|Deborah Grant|Valerie Griffiths|Czeslaw Grocholski|Leon Herbert|Chris Humphreys|Stefan Kalipha|Tacy Kneale|Tony Mathews|Richard Morant|Mia Nadasi|Jeff Nuttall|Sarah Prince|Ann Queensberry|Raad Rawi|Terence Rigby|Jennifer Scott Malden|Johnny Shannon|Malcolm Terris|Joan Turner|Doremy Vernon|James Villiers|Alison Waters|Arkie Whiteley|Tariq Yunus|Toni Shiletto|Colette Dolan|Jackie Harvey|Kate Charman|Mark Adelman|John Piper|Ray Irwin|Patrice Serapiglia|Anders Janes|Susie Ann Watkins|Roy Beck|Tina Simmons
title: Escándalo (El caso de Christine Keeler)
